Name: Germany
Description: The largest economy in Europe, known for its engineering, history, and culture.

Name: United Kingdom
Description: A country comprising England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland, known for its monarchy, history, and cultural influence.

Name: France
Description: Famous for its art, fashion, cuisine, and as a global center of culture and history.

Name: Italy
Description: Known for its historical landmarks, art, fashion, and cuisine.

Name: Spain
Description: Known for its diverse regions, vibrant culture, and landmarks like Gaudi's architecture.

Name: Ukraine
Description: Largest country entirely in Europe, known for its rich history and agricultural resources.

Name: Poland
Description: Known for its rich history, medieval architecture, and beautiful landscapes.

Name: Romania
Description: Known for its medieval towns, castles, and mountainous landscapes.

Name: Netherlands
Description: Known for its flat landscape, tulip fields, windmills, and cycling routes.

Name: Belgium
Description: Known for its medieval towns, Renaissance architecture, and chocolates.

Name: Greece
Description: Known for its ancient history, ruins, and beautiful Mediterranean beaches.

Name: Portugal
Description: Known for its coastal region, beaches, and delicious cuisine.

Name: Czech Republic
Description: Known for its medieval towns, castles, and being the birthplace of pilsner beer.

Name: Sweden
Description: Known for its stunning nature, high quality of life, and cultural innovation.

Name: Hungary
Description: Known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and thermal baths.

Name: Belarus
Description: Landlocked country in Eastern Europe known for its Soviet heritage and historical sites.

Name: Serbia
Description: Known for its rich history, churches, and vibrant cultural scene.

Name: Bulgaria
Description: Known for its natural beauty, including mountains, beaches, and unique cultural heritage.

Name: Croatia
Description: Known for its Adriatic coastline, historic towns, and beautiful islands.

Name: Slovakia
Description: Known for its medieval castles, villages, and the High Tatras mountain range.

Name: Slovenia
Description: Known for its mountains, lakes, and picturesque towns.

Name: North Macedonia
Description: Known for its rich history and cultural heritage.
